member.name: WS_ENDPOINT_POLICY_EXTENSION
member.summary: This structure is used to specify an endpoint policy extension.

member.name: WS_ENDPOINT_POLICY_EXTENSION.policyExtension
member.summary: The base policy extension that this policy extension derives from.

member.name: WS_ENDPOINT_POLICY_EXTENSION.assertionName
member.summary: Name of the assertion to be retrieved as an extension.

member.name: WS_ENDPOINT_POLICY_EXTENSION.assertionNs
member.summary: Namespace of the assertion to be retrieved as an extension.

member.name: WS_ENDPOINT_POLICY_EXTENSION.out
member.summary: When returns NOERROR, the fields of this structure will be filled out as follows:

member.name: WS_ENDPOINT_POLICY_EXTENSION.out.assertionValue
member.summary: When returns NOERROR and if the specified assertion is found in the policy alternative, assertionValue returns the read-only content. Returned buffer should not be modified or freed. If not found, it is set to NULL.
